item.title: After Making Money On ‘America 250,’ The NFL Will Go Back To Hating The USA
item.description: Any patriotism on display by the NFL over the next few months will be, at best, a bait and switch.

item.title: Felon Milwaukee County Judge Resigns With Guaranteed Pension
item.description: A federal jury last month convicted Hannah Dugan of obstructing ICE agents attempting to arrest an illegal immigrant.

item.title: Hegseth: America’s Military Is ‘Already Surpassing’ Last Year’s Recruiting Figures
item.description: 'We're setting new records at the War Department of historic recruitment of men and women wanting to join the ranks,' said War Secretary Pete Hegseth.
